title.en: The Pulsing Core of the Emerald Trench

description.ko: 빛과 자연이 동기화된 수중 흐름 속에서 호흡하는 가장 원초적인 수준의 유기적 생명을 표현했습니다.
description.en: A representation of organic life at its most primal level, where light and nature breathe in a synchronized underwater flow.

prompt: A massive, breathing biological engine made of translucent #7FB069 moss and #FFE66D glowing neural filaments, suspended in a deep #2D5A3D underwater trench. The structure pulses with rhythmic liquid light, featuring heavy subsurface scattering on organic membranes. Surrounding the core are #E6F2E1 floating spores and wispy, glowing tendrils swaying in a slow current. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, cinematic volumetric lighting piercing through the dark green water, highlighting the microscopic texture of the breathing light of nature.
